content.text: Evan is a fictional character played by Matt Price on The Office.

Evan is a representative for Hammermill Papers. Michael meets Evan at a convention and sets up a deal so that Dunder Mifflin can distribute Hammermill products. This was an extraordinary feat, considering prior to Michael's meeting, Hammermill had an exclusive contract with Staples.
Later in the evening, Evan shows up at Michael's room for the "party."
